description: The transport layer security associated with an Ingress.

hosts.description: A list of hosts included in the TLS certificate. The values in this list must match the name/s used in the TLS Secret. Defaults to the wildcard host setting for the loadbalancer controller fulfilling this Ingress.

secretName.description: The name of the Secret used to terminate SSL traffic on port 443. Field is left optional to allow SSL routing based on SNI hostname alone. If the SNI host in a listener conflicts with the '`Host`' header field used by an entry in the `rules` list, the SNI host is used for termination and value of the '`Host`' header is used for routing.
